cats_lover.name: ADORABLE KITTY NOTEBOOK
cats_lover.description: Adorable kitty notebook, four designs available. Write down everything you need to keep your day organized. These A5 (148×210 mm.) notebooks fit easily in your purse to take notes on the go.This adorable kitty notebook makes a perfect little sketchbook for cat doodles!

cats_lover.description:
Black cat decorative wall clock.
 Beautiful and cute, this wall clock is perfect for your living room!
Environmental, waterproof and corrosion-resistant.
Simple, elegant and full of rhythm, expands the sense of space. Landscaping decoration.
It can be affixed to any flat surface.
Easy to paste, environmental protection materials, waterproof.
Black cat decorative wall clock with a unique design.

Easy to clean.
Elegant design, black cat fishing decorative wall clock.

cats_lover.name: CAT SHAPED NIGHT LIGHT
cats_lover.description:
Cat shaped night light.
Say hello to this Kawaii Kitten Night Light, an adorable night cat lamp that stays by your side and brings brightness, warmth, and happiness to you. You can change the light color by tapping on the Kitten or you can poke this little ball when you are upset.
 Touch it, feel it, and have fun with this great cat home décor!
Dimensions: 90×102 mm.
Cat shaped night light, three design options: Lovely Cat | Popular Cat | Clever Cat.
Cat printed design.
Silicone night lamp.
Change between seven colors by tapping on the kitten.
Trendy and cute home décor.
AAA Battery Type.

Durable and fashionable.

Cute cat ears purse wallet with decorative tassel.
Note Compartment, Photo Holder, Card Holder.
